value.name: The Latest: Man slain by officer had prior abuse charge
value.description: That's according to the East Baton Rouge Parish Coroner's Office, which released preliminary results of an autopsy performed Tuesday on 24-year-old Calvin Toney. Authorities say Toney was shot and ...

value.name: DCFS on officer-involved shooting: police escorts 'not unusual'
value.description: BATON ROUGE - Officer Darrell Carter of the Baton ... Monday night's officer-involved shooting took the life of 24-year-old Calvin Toney who officials said fought for Officer Carter's weapon ...

value.name: 4 years after Alton Sterling, here's what reviews of police shootings look like in Baton Rouge
value.description: Since Alton Sterling's death four years ago this month, the East Baton Rouge Parish District Attorney's Office has reviewed 15 cases in which law enforcement officers either shot or killed someone.
